system.availability: Has Pict Recorder, can extend to 3 metres, and reduce width to pencil thickness. +10 Bonus to perception tests and +20 to vision-based tests at night, can examine surfaces on microscopic level and be used as telescopic sight. Also has normal and IR lights.
system.cost: Legally, limited to members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, requires relevent Mechadendrite Use Talent and Cyber-Mantle. May not have more Mechadendrites than Toughness Bonus
